entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 10:00AM AKDT until March 17 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Visibilities reduced to one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts as high as 50 mph.

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 45 below occuring. Plan on areas of poor visibilities to create difficult travel conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 45 below.
